thread.section_title: iQ Hotel Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Morden Hotel -
thread.title_full: Morden Hotel - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Nikunj D
title: Morden Hotel -
text: This place is situated very near to Republica metro station which makes it convenient to approach and stay. Also the place is very close to Roma Termini so as to approach for any other connections. Hotel is a Morden hotel with all the amenities. Rooms are decently sized and are well maintained. Wifi is also fast and reliable. The bar and Resturant on the 5th floor is amazing and serves nice drinks. Gym is also well equipped. Overall a good place to stay during your next visit to Rome.
